title: The Vancouver Recipe
full_text:
The Vancouver Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
gin
1/2
ounce
sweet vermouth
1
teaspoon
Benedictine
1-2
dashes
orange bitters
, to taste
Thin strip of lemon peel
, for garnish
Directions
Combine ingredients in mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well until chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over drink and use as garnish.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass, bar spoon, strainer
Gin
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
